Let me try to write a hash table module. Module HashTableMod
    implicit none
    private
    public :: initHashTable, addEntry, getCount, finalizeHashTable

    type :: HashEntry
        integer :: key
        integer :: count
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: next => null()
    end type HashEntry

    integer, parameter :: TABLE_SIZE = 1000
    type(HashEntry), pointer :: table(TABLE_SIZE) => null()

contains

    subroutine initHashTable()
        integer :: i
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

    subroutine addEntry(key)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: newEntry

        ! Search for existing entry
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                current%count = current%count + 1
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do

        ! Not found, create new entry
        allocate(newEntry)
        newEntry%key = key
        newEntry%count = 1
        newEntry%next => table(hash)
        table(hash) => newEntry
    end subroutine

    function getCount(key) result(count)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: count
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash) count = 0
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                count = current%count
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do
    end function

    subroutine finalizeHashTable()
        integer :: i
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current, next
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            current => table(i)
            do while (associated(current)) next => current%next
                deallocate(current)
                current => next
            end do
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

end module HashTableMod

Then, in the main program, we can use this module. But this requires writing this module and integrating it into the code.

Increased size for better distribution
    type(HashEntry), pointer :: table(TABLE_SIZE) => null()

contains

    subroutine initHashTable()
        integer :: i
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

    subroutine addEntry(key)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: newEntry

        ! Search for existing entry
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                current%count = current%count + 1
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do

        ! Not found, create new entry
        allocate(newEntry)
        newEntry%key = key
        newEntry%count = 1
        newEntry%next => table(hash)
        table(hash) => newEntry
    end subroutine

    function getCount(key) result(count)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: count
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash) count = 0
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                count = current%count
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do
    end function

    subroutine finalizeHashTable()
        integer :: i
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current, next
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            current => table(i)
            do while (associated(current)) next => current%next
                deallocate(current)
                current => next
            end do
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

end module HashTableMod

Module HashTableMod
    implicit none
    private
    public :: initHashTable, addEntry, getCount, finalizeHashTable

    type :: HashEntry
        integer :: key
        integer :: count
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: next => null()
    end type HashEntry

    integer, parameter :: TABLE_SIZE = 1000
    type(HashEntry), pointer :: table(TABLE_SIZE) => null()

contains

    subroutine initHashTable()
        integer :: i
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

    subroutine addEntry(key)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: newEntry

        ! Search for existing entry
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                current%count = current%count + 1
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do

        ! Not found, create new entry
        allocate(newEntry)
        newEntry%key = key
        newEntry%count = 1
        newEntry%next => table(hash)
        table(hash) => newEntry
    end subroutine

    function getCount(key) result(count)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: count
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)

        count = 0
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                count = current%count
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do
    end function

    subroutine finalizeHashTable()
        integer :: i
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current, next
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            current => table(i)
            do while (associated(current))
                next => current%next
                deallocate(current)
                current => next
            end do
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

end module HashTableMod

program main
    use HashTableMod

    integer :: n, i, x, prime, sum_result

    call initHashTable()
    do i = 1, n
        call addEntry(ara(i))
    end do

    ! Find max_freq
    max_freq = 0
    do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
        current => table(i)
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%count > max_freq) then
                max_freq = current%count
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do

        current_count = getCount(key)
        if (current_count == max_freq) then
            x = key
            exit
        end if
    end do
    call finalizeHashTable() ! Cleanup

    ! Now compute second program's output (prime)
    prime = x
    if (prime /= 2 .and. mod(prime,2) == 0) then
        prime = prime +1
    end if
    do while (.true.)
        integer :: sqrt_num = int(sqrt(real(prime)))
        logical :: is_prime = .true.
        do i = 3, sqrt_num, 2
            if (mod(prime, i) == 0) then
                is_prime = .false.
                exit

        if (is_prime) then
            exit
        else
            prime = prime +2
        end if
    end do

    ! Compute third program's output (sum)
    sum_result = 0
    do i = 1, prime
        integer :: q = prime / i
        sum_result = sum_result + i * q * (q +1)/2
    end do

    print *, sum_result

end program main

module HashTableMod
    implicit none
    private
    public :: initHashTable, addEntry, getCount, finalizeHashTable

    type :: HashEntry
        integer :: key
        integer :: count
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: next => null()
    end type HashEntry

    integer, parameter :: TABLE_SIZE = 100000  ! Increased size for better distribution
    type(HashEntry), pointer :: table(TABLE_SIZE) => null()

contains

    subroutine initHashTable()
        integer :: i
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

    subroutine addEntry(key)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: newEntry

        ! Search for existing entry
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                current%count = current%count + 1
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do

        ! Not found, create new entry
        allocate(newEntry)
        newEntry%key = key
        newEntry%count = 1
        newEntry%next => table(hash)
        table(hash) => newEntry
    end subroutine

    function getCount(key) result(count)
        integer, intent(in) :: key
        integer :: count
        integer :: hash = mod(abs(key), TABLE_SIZE)
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current => table(hash)

        count = 0
        do while (associated(current))
            if (current%key == key) then
                count = current%count
                return
            end if
            current => current%next
        end do
    end function

    subroutine finalizeHashTable()
        integer :: i
        type(HashEntry), pointer :: current, next
        do i = 1, TABLE_SIZE
            current => table(i)
            do while (associated(current))
                next => current%next
                deallocate(current)
                current => next
            end do
            table(i) => null()
        end do
    end subroutine

end module HashTableMod
